verbose_text: TMZ has been known to decrease the intracellular accumulation of sodium and calcium and to inhibit platelet adhesion aggregation, neutrophil infiltration, and the generation or activity of oxygen derived free radicals [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
